attributes.action: Increase income tax on people between 20 and 35 to avoid having to charge for road use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Young people have it so good these days, not like in my day. I think they should pay more tax so that they learn to value hard work.
I'm disgusted that my wife and I might be charged for driving 200 miles a week when they can just earn money like they do willy nilly
